reviewText:
Mo knows

good delivery of product

Very comprehensive introduction to the game from a superior senior player. He explains all of the shots and strategy with laymen's language. I like how the video is broken down by the various shots so you can select the one you are having issues with. My game has definitely improved after watching the clips.
A very worthwhile video. Well worth the money spent. Lots of beneficial information provided by Coach Mo. Highly recommend it to others.
The content of the disk was fine when it would play.  The disk would frequently stop, stutter, or outright stop.
This was very helpful for improving our game and perfecting the basics.  No regrets...It is well done and easy to navigate.

I am still waiting to see if the dealer is going to refund all costs, including return shipping due to the fact that no where did it say, at the time I purchased this item, that it was NOT intended to be played on a computer, only on dvd players for TV's (my computer has had no problems playing all other DVD's).  Dealer said this was done to prevent the disc from being copied - how do others manage to prevent coping and still allow DVD's to be played on computers?  Bummer.
